sentences.en: Even those passengers who were most distrustful of themselves plucked up amazingly.
sentences.cn: 甚至那些对自己最缺乏信心的乘客也鼓起了勇气,真令人惊异.

sentences.en: His mouth was thin and evil, the eye distrustful.
sentences.cn: 他是嘴薄而恶毒, 眼睛多疑.

sentences.en: I'm distrustful of such cheap goods.
Jack listens as Teri hides the phone from the distrustful Eli.
sentences.cn: 泰瑞藏起了手机,伊菜对她很是怀疑,杰克通过电话另一端倾听着这一切.

sentences.en: Many people are naturally distrustful of ambition.
sentences.cn: 很多人本能地对雄心有疑虑.

sentences.en: That was the way in Menzoberranzan: always alert, always distrustful.
sentences.cn: 这就是魔索布莱的作风: 始终保持警惕, 始终保持怀疑.

sentences.en: The hostilities between a distrustful organising committee and a sceptical media have intensified every day.
sentences.cn: 让人无法信任的组织者和日趋持怀疑态度的媒体间的争执在一天天的激烈.

sentences.en: The older you get the more distrustful you become.
Voters are deeply distrustful of all politicians.
sentences.cn: 选民对所有的政客都深表怀疑。

sentences.en: Wealthy person feels his son is very clever, and distrustful neighbour old person is a burglar.
sentences.cn: 富人觉得他儿子很聪明, 而怀疑邻居老人是个窃贼.

sentences.en: With lots of details, you are analytical, cautious, and distrustful.
sentences.cn: 猪若画得很细, 表示你爱分析 、 有警觉心, 不容易相信别人.

sentences.en: With many details, you are analytical, cautious, and distrustful.
sentences.cn: 猪有许多细节, 您善分析, 谨慎, 有怀疑心.

phrases.tran_cn: 怀疑…，对…不相信，认为…靠不住

trans.tran_cn: 不信任的，怀疑的，可疑的
trans.tran_en: If you are distrustful of someone or something, you think that they are not honest, reliable, or safe
